title: ScratchPad 1.2.2 Released!
excerpt: ScratchPad 1.2.2 has been released! Included in the new version: [Feature] Users can now delete pages via a new menu item or a new toolbar button. [Fixed] Empty pages are no longer saved and also automatically removed from the harddrive. [Fixed] Fixed a problem with the German localization and umlauts. You can download either by … more →
